/** * com.swygbro.packup.template.mapper.TemplateMapper > getCateTemplateObject * 작성자 : 홍섭 * 설명 : 카테고리에 연결된 오브젝트 검색 * */ SELECT A.OBJ_NO, A.CATE_NO, A.OBJ_NM, B.ORG_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_OBJECT A LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTCH_FILE B ON A.OBJ_NO = B.REF_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND CATE_NO = #{cateNo}

/** * com.swygbro.packup.template.mapper.TemplateMapper > getTemplate * 작성자 : 홍섭 * 설명 : 템플릿 상세 검색 * */ SELECT A.TEMPLATE_NO, A.USER_NO, A.USER_ID, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.UPD_DT, A.UPD_ID, A.TEMPLATE_NM, B.ORG_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_USER_TEMPLATE A LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTCH_FILE B ON A.TEMPLATE_NO = B.REF_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.TEMPLATE_NO = #{templateNo}

/** * com.swygbro.packup.template.mapper.TemplateMapper > getStepsByTemplateNo * 작성자 : 홍섭 * 설명 : 템플릿 스텝 검색 * */ SELECT TEMPLATE_STEP_NO, STEP, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT, ALARM_DT, REPEAT_TYPE, ALARM_REPEAT_DAY, ALARM_TIME, STEP_X, STEP_Y FROM TBL_USER_TEMPLATE_STEP A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEMPLATE_NO = #{templateNo}

/** * com.swygbro.packup.template.mapper.TemplateMapper > getStepObjByStepNo * 작성자 : 홍섭 * 설명 : 템플릿 스텝에 연결된 오브젝트 검색 * */ SELECT A.TEMP_USER_OBJ_NO, A.TEMPLATE_STEP_NO, A.CATE_NO, A.OBJ_NO, A.OBJ_NM, A.REG_ID, A.REG_DT, A.UPD_ID, A.UPD_DT, A.OBJ_CNT, A.LOC_NUM, A.STEP, A.TEMPLATE_NO, B.ORG_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_USER_TEMPLATE_STEP_OBJ A LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTCH_FILE B ON A.TEMPLATE_NO = B.REF_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND STEP = #{step} AND TEMPLATE_NO = #{templateNo}

/** * com.swygbro.packup.template.mapper.TemplateMapper > getStepTextByStepNo * 작성자 : 홍섭 * 설명 : 템플릿 스텝에 연결된 텍스트 검색 * */ SELECT TEXT_NO, TEMPLATE_STEP_NO, TEXT, STEP_TEXT_X, STEP_TEXT_Y, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT, TEMPLATE_NO FROM TBL_USER_TEMPLATE_STEP_TEXT A WHERE 1=1 AND TEMPLATE_NO = #{templateNo} AND STEP = #{step}

/** * com.swygbro.packup.template.mapper.TemplateMapper > getTemplatesByUserId * 작성자 : 홍섭 * 설명 : 템플릿 아이디 검색 * */ SELECT A.TEMPLATE_NO, A.USER_NO, A.USER_ID, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.UPD_DT, A.UPD_ID, A.TEMPLATE_NM, B.ORG_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_USER_TEMPLATE A LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTCH_FILE B ON A.TEMPLATE_NO = B.REF_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.REG_ID = #{userId} LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

/** * com.swygbro.packup.template.mapper.TemplateMapper > getTemplateDetailData * 작성자 : 홍섭 * 설명 : 템플릿 번호 검색 * */ SELECT A.TEMPLATE_NO, A.USER_NO, A.USER_ID, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.UPD_DT, A.UPD_ID, A.TEMPLATE_NM, B.ORG_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_USER_TEMPLATE A LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTCH_FILE B ON A.TEMPLATE_NO = B.REF_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEMPLATE_NO = #{templateNo} AND A.REG_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_USER_TEMPLATE SET TEMPLATE_NM = #{templateNm}, DEL_YN = #{delYn}, UPD_ID = #{userId}, UPD_DT = NOW() WHERE TEMPLATE_NO = #{templateNo}

UPDATE TBL_USER_TEMPLATE_STEP SET
ALARM_DT = #{alarmDt},
REPEAT_TYPE = #{repeatType},
STEP_X = #{stepX}, STEP_Y = #{stepY}, DEL_YN = #{delYn}, UPD_ID = #{userId}, UPD_DT = NOW() WHERE TEMPLATE_NO = #{templateNo} AND TEMPLATE_STEP_NO = #{templateStepNo} AND STEP = #{step}

UPDATE TBL_USER_TEMPLATE_STEP_TEXT SET TEXT = #{text}, STEP_TEXT_X = #{stepTextX}, STEP_TEXT_Y = #{stepTExtY}, STEP = #{step}, DEL_YN = #{delYn}, UPD_ID = #{userId}, UPD_DT = NOW() WHERE TEXT_NO = #{textNo} AND TEMPLATE_STEP_NO = #{templateStepNo} AND STEP = #{step}
